divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a campground next to a lake, so I was looking out over the lake at a fairly wide horizon. It was dark. The pill-shaped light blinked on the South horizon toward Albany and moved impossibly quickly across the sky. It blinked three more times and then a final time on the Northern horizon toward Glens Falls. It was gone in a few seconds. My reaction was that nothing I knew of could move so fast accross the sky.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around August 15th 1999
Summary: saw pill-shaped light flash five times horizon-horizon
